text:
Hi guys,
Noticed, that if you add a `module`, it will be shown only in the `all` category on the editor. Is there a way to have it in the theme modules section as well? I’m guessing that’s based on the directory structure of the theme folder and the react modules are not there (inside projects). So prob it should also look the `@projects/{project}/{app}/components/modules` folder as well.
Currently there is no way to do this, and JS Modules cannot be within a Theme.
However, we are working toward a solution for this that will allow JS Building Blocks and Themes to be more seamless.

>  …/components/partials/ComponentX/index.jsx
Directory partials like above (referenced as `@projects/<project>/<projectComponent>/components/partials/ComponentX`), the same as Directory modules, are now supported :+1:
